remarks: Closure of a group sum in a subgroup.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.)  (Revised by AV, 3-Jun-2019.)
statement:
gsumsubgcl.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumsubgcl.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
gsumsubgcl.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumsubgcl.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
gsumsubgcl.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) $.
gsumsubgcl.w $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
gsumsubgcl $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) e. S ) $.
